title: Scattering of kinks in coreless potentials
authors: Ond\v{r}ej Nicolas Karp\'i\v{s}ek, Luk\'a\v{s} Rafaj, Filip Blaschke
abstract:
We explore the relevance of the central hill for a symmetric double-well
potential and its impact on the scattering of kinks in a scalar field theory in
(1+1)-dimensions. This region controls the inner core structure of the kink. We
study how the disappearance of analyticity in this region of the potential
affects the resonant features in $K\bar{K}$ scattering.
